title: Mobile devices used by U.S. students 2015 , by type and frequency
labels: A few times a month or less
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 4 different Responses for 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more that are presented on the X-axis.

Out of all 3 groups, Never had the highest Share of respondents in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer and A few times a month or less had the lowest Share of respondents in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.

In Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook, A few times a month or less had the highest Share of respondents among all 4 Responses and it has the lowest Share of respondents in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook and Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer had the biggest gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for A few times a month or less.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 4 different Responses for 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more that are presented on the X-axis.

Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer had the maximum Share of respondents among all 3 groups, and it was for Never. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer for A few times a month or less.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 4 different Responses for 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more that are presented on the X-axis.

Out of all 3 groups, Never had the highest Share of respondents in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer and A few times a month or less had the lowest Share of respondents in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.

In Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook, A few times a month or less had the highest Share of respondents among all 4 Responses and it has the lowest Share of respondents in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook and Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer had the biggest gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for A few times a month or less.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 4 different Responses for 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more that are presented on the X-axis.

Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer had the maximum Share of respondents among all 3 groups, and it was for Never. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer for A few times a month or less.
Among all the Responses, A few times a month or less had the highest Share of respondents 22.0 in Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook and lowest value 5.0 in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook and Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer had the biggest gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for A few times a month or less.
Among the groups, Never had the biggest difference in Share of respondents. Where the maximum Share of respondents was 4.94 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents.

Never had the maximum Share of respondents out of all 3 groups in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer followed by Never in Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer, and the minimum Share of respondents is found for A few times a month or less in Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.

On average, the Response Tablet had the highest Share of respondents for all 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more. Whereas Smartphone had the lowest average Share of respondents.
